Package ch.ethz.bhepp.ode

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdaptiveStepSolver
    An Interface for solving an Ode with adaptive step size.
    EventFunction
    An Interface defining the roots to be found during integration.
    EventObserver
    An Interface for observing the events/roots during the integration of an ODE with a Solver.
    FixedStepSolver
    An Interface for solving an Ode with fixed step size.
    Ode
    An Interface describing a system of Ordinary Differential Equations.
    Solver
    An Interface for solving an Ode.
    StateObserver
    An Interface for observing the state during the integration of an ODE with a Solver.
    TimepointProvider
    An Interface TimepointProvider to provide timesteps for an ODE Solver.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferEventFunctionAdapter
    This class takes an EventFunction and provides an equivalent EventFunction implementation that is backed by buffers suitable for solvers that make use of JNI (by using direct buffers).
    BufferOdeAdapter
    This class takes an Ode and provides an equivalent Ode implementation that is backed by buffers suitable for solvers that make use of JNI (by using direct buffers).
    DummyEventFunction  
    DummyEventObserver  
    FiniteTimepointProvider  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventObserver.EventAction
    An Enum describing the Action to take when an event has been detected.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Exception
    The Class Exception as a base for all custom exceptions in this package.
    Solver.InitializationException
    The Class InitializationException.
    Solver.IntegrationException
    The Class IntegrationException.
    TimepointProvider.NoMoreTimepointsException
    The Class NoMoreTimepointsException.
